title: Similiarities between Mughal and Ottoman Empires

content.prompt: The Mughal Empire and the Ottoman Empire before 1700 C.E. shared which of the following characteristics?

choices.label: Both empires were able to expand without meeting strong resistance.
Both empires were ruled by a single religious official.
Both empires were religiously and culturally diverse.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
